HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Free for orders over 2 000,- Kč. Otherwise, PPL/DHL is 95,- Kč and Balíkovna na adresu is 90,- Kč.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Next business day for orders placed by 15:00 (PPL/DHL) or 12:00 (Balíkovna).

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: GEIS Home Delivery Premium (carry-in service): 390 - 990 Kč. Delivery with assembly by technician: 2,490 - 5,490 Kč depending on the machine. Additional fees for carrying items upstairs without an elevator (150 - 600 Kč per floor depending on weight).
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: GEIS: 48 - 72 hours. Delivery with assembly: scheduled by phone 1-2 days in advance.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Free for orders over 2 000,- Kč. Otherwise, PPL Parcelshop is 45,- Kč, Zásilkovna is 69,- Kč, and PPL Depo is 95,- Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: Zásilkovna: Free for orders over 2 000,- Kč, otherwise 69,- Kč. Balíkovna: Free for orders over 2 000,- Kč, otherwise 90,- Kč (as part of home delivery service).

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The store offers a wide range of delivery methods including standard home delivery, specialized bulky item delivery, parcel shop/locker services, and in-store pickup.
PROVIDERS: Key providers are PPL, DHL, Balíkovna (Česká pošta), Zásilkovna (Packeta), and GEIS for bulky items.
PRICING: Most standard delivery options are free for orders over 2,000 Kč. Below this amount, fees range from 45 Kč to 95 Kč. The COD surcharge is a flat 25 Kč. In-store pickup is free.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The store provides specialized services for its fitness equipment, including a 'Home Delivery Premium' service by GEIS that includes carrying the item into the customer's apartment (390-990 Kč) and a full delivery and assembly service by an in-house technician (2,490-5,490 Kč). There are four physical stores for personal pickup (Liberec, Praha, Brno, Plzeň), which are open on Saturdays.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is exceptionally clear, detailed, and consolidated on a single, easy-to-find page. It effectively distinguishes between different types of delivery services, their costs, providers, and specific conditions, making it very user-friendly.
